quote: Failure and missteps help refine your character and make you wiser.
author: Chad Gilbert

quote: I may be a successful football player, but I feel like such a failure.
author: Brett Favre

quote: I don't have any fear of failure whatsoever. I used to, and I told myself I wouldn't allow myself to anymore.
author: Jaylen Brown

quote: The Prince interview was a failure. Huge, but most memorable 'cause he didn't say anything.
author: Dick Clark

quote: If you're 40 years old and you've never had a failure, you've been deprived.
author: Gloria Swanson

quote: I guess you can say that my unwillingness to accept failure is what drives my success.
author: Phil Hellmuth

quote: Educational institutes can no longer be prizes in church politics or furnish berths for failure in other walks of life.
author: E. Franklin Frazier

quote: The failure of Christianity in the areas west from Sicily was even greater, and was increased by the spread of Arab outlooks and influence to that area, and especially to Spain.
author: Carroll Quigley

quote: I was never afraid of failure after that because, I think, coming that close to death you get kissed. With the years, the actual experience of course fades, but the flavor of it doesn't. I just had a real sense of what choice do I have but to live fully?
author: Debra Winger

quote: Today, everybody is more or less conscious of the total failure of the Cuban revolution to produce wealth, to produce a better standard of living for the Cubans. With the exception of small radical parties, Latin Americans know that it's a brutal dictatorship and the longest in Latin American history.
author: Mario Vargas Llosa

quote: In God's world, for those who are in earnest, there is no failure. No work truly done, no word earnestly spoken, no sacrifice freely made, was ever made in vain.
author: Frederick William Robertson

quote: Success and failure are a part of filmmaking.
author: Vijay Krishna Acharya

quote: Well, the idea is that failure is an inevitable partner on the road to success and, if you're not willing to confront failure, you can never find out how good you are.
author: Peter Guber

quote: A lot of actors do that - they blame their failure on their agents or their photos. But that is just putting off the real issues.
author: Matt Berry

quote: Civilization is a failure. We need to think what we can do together in love and peace.
author: Serj Tankian

quote: They say baseball's a game of failure. Well, that's only true on the offensive side.
author: Clayton Kershaw

quote: I don't need to be looking at every failure of government, I need to be looking where failure of government needs reform.
author: Darrell Issa

quote: I write good songs out of fear... fear of failure. Because if they're not good enough, you feel yourself starting to fall.
author: Ezra Furman

quote: Given the extent of the exposures of major banks around the world to A.I.G., and in light of the extreme fragility of the system, there was a significant risk that A.I.G.'s failure could have sparked a global banking panic.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: Ego is certainly there in many of the greatest and most dizzying tales of success - but it's there in some of the greatest stories of failure and self-implosion as well.
author: Ryan Holiday

quote: I have a lack of fear, whereas in the past the fear of failure was a powerful motivator. Anyway, I have great expectations for the future, but I just don't know if I'm the monarch of all I survey.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: We feel a lot of pressure about looking silly or appearing weak, whatever that means, or being a failure. You have to keep in your head: what's the worst that can happen?
author: Michael Fassbender

quote: I think that a failure of statistical thinking is the major intellectual shortcoming of our universities, journalism and intellectual culture.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: Of course, Third World leaders love you. By ascribing third world ills to First World sins, you absolve them of blame for their countries' failure to advance.
author: John McCarthy

quote: Sometimes failure isn't an opportunity in disguise, it's just you.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: By far the most important factor in the success or failure of any school, far more important than tests or standards or business-model methods of accountability, is simply attracting the best-educated, most exciting young people into urban schools and keeping them there.
author: Jonathan Kozol

quote: Whenever you start a new business, the sheer number of variables at hand makes failure a constant possibility.
author: Sallie Krawcheck

quote: In Europe, there is a lower instance of startups because there's a permanent fear of failure. Everyone fears failure because it is this permanent black mark against your name, whereas in the U.S., failure seems to be par for the course.
author: Alexander Gilkes

quote: I challenge anybody to go through their career and not have a failure as a talent.
author: Mark Henry

quote: Regard every suggestion that your life may be a failure, that you are not made like those who succeed, and that success is not for you, as a traitor, and expel it from your mind as you would a thief from your house.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The failure of credit markets is one of the major reasons for underdevelopment.
author: George Akerlof

quote: Success is always less funny than failure.
author: Jon Ronson

quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: Kids have been let down by adults - we've tried to give them too much, we've tried not to impose discipline. We've tried to make their lives easier and, in doing so, we've taken something away from them. Kids like boundaries, they also like to be pushed, need to learn what failure is all about, need guidance.
author: Daley Thompson

quote: The banking collapse was caused, more than anything, by bad government policy and the total failure of bad regulation, rather than by greed.
author: Nigel Farage

quote: You have to look at the history of the Middle East in particular. It has been one of failure and frustration, of feudalism and tribalism.
author: Alexander Haig

quote: Those who refuse to liberalise and globalise are doomed to failure.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: The great thing about baseball is the causality is easy to determine and it always falls on the shoulders of one person. So there is absolute responsibility. That's why baseball is psychologically the cruelest sport and why it really requires psychological resources to play baseball - because you have to learn to live with failure.
author: Michael Mandelbaum

quote: To harmonize the One with the Many, this is indeed a difficult adjustment, perhaps the most difficult of all, and so important, withal, that nations have perished from their failure to achieve it.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: The professed war-weariness among populations who have sent only a small percentage of their sons and daughters to fight in recent wars may derive from a failure to communicate effectively what is at stake in those wars and explain why the efforts are worthy of the risks, resources, and sacrifices necessary to sustain the strategy.
author: H. R. McMaster

quote: Dan Marino never won the big game. Does that mean his career is a failure? No, not at all.
author: Donovan McNabb

quote: I was interested in political failure here in the U.S. The way we're failing to work together to solve even our smallest problems, let alone the complex ones.
author: Paolo Bacigalupi

quote: I used to be very frightened of failure.
author: Noel Edmonds

quote: I don't want to feel like a failure to my daughter. She's the best thing I've ever done. Buffy - pretty great and all, but Charlotte's way better.
author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: You're always just trying to create opportunities and be ready when those opportunities present themselves. I can't look at anybody and think 'I want to be Damian Lewis' - I'd be setting myself up for failure.
author: Diego Klattenhoff

quote: We must stand up for the principle of parliamentary democracy and not allow the government's failure in the Brexit process to be a licence for the U.K. to crash out of the E.U. without an agreement.
author: Keir Starmer

quote: Celebrating failure is key. Half of what we do fails, at least.
author: Nancy Dubuc

quote: I'm a polarizing person, so people get caught up in hoping I fail. And just like success, failure is a perspective.
author: CM Punk

quote: As quickly as it started, our business model evaporated. But while Traf-O-Data was technically a business failure, the understanding of microprocessors we absorbed was crucial to our future success.
author: Paul Allen

quote: My feeling, based on my own experience, is that aiming for grandiosity is the fastest route to failure.
author: James Altucher

quote: I had to succeed. Failure means I would have to be homeless again.
author: Elie Tahari

quote: The Conservatives are a confusing lot. They first denied climate change was a serious issue and then suggested strengthening the nuclear industry as a solution to it. They oppose the European Union, but support joining North American Free Trade Agreement, despite its obvious failure.
author: Zac Goldsmith

quote: New Year's resolutions have always been something to beat myself up with by the second week of January. It seems perverse to set yourself up for failure right at the start of the year.
author: Romesh Ranganathan

quote: No failure in America, whether of love or money, is ever simple; it is always a kind of betrayal, of a mass of shadowy, shared hopes.
author: Greil Marcus

quote: I would replace most foreign aid with a tax credit for businesses to invest. I think U.S. bureaucrats giving foreign bureaucrats money is a guaranteed failure. And we've had about 50 years' experience at failing with foreign aid.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: But if you look at WorldCom, which is the biggest failure to date, they grew dramatically, they were buying companies that were bigger than they were and they were doing it off inflated stock.
author: Don Nickles

quote: Remember what Susan B. Anthony said? 'Failure is impossible.' Failure is possible if women don't vote.
author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quote: Acting allows me the freedom to let go, to be in the moment, to be spontaneous. I no longer have the fear of losing, of failure.
author: Cathy Rigby

quote: I think if you look at the failure of journalism in the modern age, then I don't want to be called a journalist.
author: Shane Smith

quote: Questioning the nature and implications of liminal instances necessarily involves failure, if only in the specifically technical sense of entering spaces where prevailing criteria of success scarcely apply.
author: Brian Ferneyhough

quote: I never feel any pressure about a film. What is meant to happen will happen. I have seen failure as well as success several times.
author: Akshay Kumar

quote: I believe you must find the things in life that you love, and don't let anybody or anything stop you. There may be lesser successes, but you're never a failure unless you choose not to do something. I don't fail unless I quit. You must believe to receive.
author: Bret Michaels

quote: Apple is a failure because they missed social? Nobody would say that, because they are having great success.
author: Steve Ballmer

quote: The revolutions of my century, the 20th century - the Soviet revolution, or the Chinese, or the revolutions that were fomented in Latin America, such as in Cuba - failed for the most part, a failure which was completely clear by the end of the century.
author: Stephane Hessel

quote: I can't say I'm not grateful to have journalists writing about me as a genius. But I know it's not true. I'm not confused. I understand that success comes through a lot of failure and a lot of very embarrassing failure. People want to create the next Facebook, but they are too afraid to create the next Facemash.
author: Eric Ries

quote: I am far more comfortable with failure than I ever will be with success.
author: Shekhar Kapur

quote: I teach students that what people say about failure in politics is mostly wrong. People always told me, 'They'll praise you on your way up and kick you on your way down.' That wasn't my experience. I can't walk down the street in Toronto without someone coming up and saying hello.
author: Michael Ignatieff

quote: I want to do good work. The first failure affected me. That is why I did 'Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum.'
author: Neha Sharma

quote: Most leadership strategies are doomed to failure from the outset. As people have been noting for years, the majority of strategic initiatives that are driven from the top are marginally effective - at best.
author: Peter Senge

quote: Directly after the show people might have responded better to it, but who really knows. It did what it did and while it seems like a failure to most but it was a success for me and has given me so many opportunities.
author: Justin Guarini

quote: I don't think anybody should do what they do in hopes of being successful. But I always expect myself to be successful at things. And if I'm not, I feel bad. I don't care for failure. I've failed at a number of things, and it's not my favorite state of mind. So I prefer success.
author: Michael Feldman

quote: I feel that 'The Great Failure' is really a book written out of great love and a willingness to face all of who a human being is.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: There were times in 'Adaptation' during the editing where I really thought, 'Okay, well, this was a noble failure. I tried to do something good, but this is not going to work.'
author: Spike Jonze

quote: We learned not to let the fear of failure stop us from attempting to fulfil our dreams - whether that dream involved a change in career, attempting to set world records, or helping young people.
author: Holly Branson

quote: I had this contract to write songs for people when I was about 18. I don't think any of them were taken up; I was a complete failure at it! But I've kept doing it, writing little songs for myself.
author: Douglas Hodge

quote: Ergonomics is about designing for failure modes and extremes: how things break under repetition, stress or other limits. And the goal of ergonomic designis to create an alignment between the user's limits, the thing you're designing, and how people will ideally use that thing.
author: Tristan Harris

quote: I want to become a star. Failure is not an option.
author: Memphis Depay

quote: I know it wouldn't seem like I've had a lot of failure in my career, but there are things that I regard as failures, when I look at certain performances and go, 'That's not good enough.'
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: My film directorial career has been nothing but repetition of one failure after another!
author: Takeshi Kitano

quote: Our educational system is not preparing people for the 21st Century. Failure is an essential part of entrepreneurship. If you work hard, you can get an 'A' pretty much guaranteed, but in entrepreneurship, that's not how it works.
author: Eric Ries

quote: The Bay of Pigs became a metaphor for feckless folly and failure.
author: Pat Buchanan

quote: Daring is doing. Daring is asking something outrageous despite your chances of failure and rejection. Daring is going out on a limb by believing in something that no one else understands, and if all fails, daring is trying again.
author: Bibi Bourelly

quote: Try not to say, 'I'm a failure.' Instead, ask, 'What can I do better? What did I do wrong?' Then re-approach.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: If you can't admit a failure, you're not an entrepreneur. You are not a good business person. There's nothing brilliant about what you are doing.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: At the end of the day, that's all that matters. Winning a championship. Everything else is failure.
author: P. J. Tucker

quote: We will fiercely challenge those forces within the education establishment who impede innovation in our schools and who protect and defend inequality and institutional failure.
author: Campbell Brown

quote: In the future, financial firms of any type whose failure would pose a systemic risk must accept especially close regulatory scrutiny of their risk-taking.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: I cannot think of any venture I have initiated where an earlier failure wasn't an important precursor to an eventual success.
author: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: If a debt crisis results from government profligacy and mismanagement, rather than from a market failure, it is true that the central bank should not intervene.
author: Gita Gopinath

quote: Fear of failure held me back from being a DIYer for many years, especially after a few early attempts at home improvement projects went awry.
author: Mark Frauenfelder

quote: Government doesn't have a high tolerance for failure.
author: John Hickenlooper

quote: It has always felt like a failure that Bjorn and I couldn't keep our family together. You never get it back, but to this day I don't regret splitting up. The reason behind our separation is one of those things I definitely don't want to go into!
author: Agnetha Faltskog

quote: Brain surgeons are dealing with the very last thread of life, and they have to be very confident, but I think they tend to remember their failures rather than their successes, and that must be very hard. Who do you share that failure with? That's why their personal lives are often disastrous.
author: James Nesbitt

quote: I know that there is failure, but if you're prepared, you can accept whatever happens in the ring.
author: Joseph Parker

quote: While the public school rewards failure by throwing more government money at failing school systems, the voucher system does the opposite.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: If learners do not have a roof under which they can learn we are already setting them up for failure.
author: Zozibini Tunzi

quote: I find rejection or failure to be a really interesting and valuable experience.
author: Brian Grazer

quote: The failure to work out sensible budgets makes it impossible for government agencies to make long-term plans, and instead leaves them scrambling to spend money in the short term.
author: Matt Taibbi

quote: Already from your own cells scientists can grow skin, cartilage, noses, blood vessels, bladders and windpipes. In the future, scientists will grow more complex organs, like livers and kidneys. The phrase 'organ failure' will disappear.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: The best advice I give to young people starting out is choose your boss. Regardless of gender, I think it is important to have someone who supports you and lets you take risks without fear of failure.
author: Nancy Dubuc

quote: I think the fall in Eden was ultimately a failure to give thanks.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: I tend to avoid interviews, I don't have a publicist and fear of failure is still very much alive in my personal life.
author: James Newton Howard

quote: It's probably foolish to expect relationships to go on forever and to say that because something only lasts 10 years, it's a failure.
author: James Taylor

quote: A traveller must buy his own experience, and success or failure depends mainly on personal idiosyncrasies.
author: Isabella Bird

quote: I would be lying if I'd say success and failure doesn't matter because they do. For now, my biggest joy is that I am able to bring you so much work, which I think is also a success.
author: Amit Sadh

quote: I think probably the moments of failure have been when I didn't really understand that other people were around to actually help me. There were moments when I thought I had to solve everything on my own, and I didn't realize that I had resources.
author: Joanna Coles

quote: One thing I do believe is I'm a believer in the presence of God. I believe that God is close. Whether it's in joy, pain or personal failure, I believe that God is close. That much I feel in my life.
author: David Gregory

quote: People think when you have a, quote, 'bank failure,' that that is the end of the bank. And it isn't necessarily.
author: Michele Bachmann

quote: And I went to New York and died; for 10 years I walked those pavements. I can't think of New York without feeling uncomfortable and feeling like a failure.
author: Harvey Korman

quote: Second novels are bears. As are other people's expectations for them. I think taking the time you need with the second book is key. Writers spend years and years on their first novels and then are often expected to turn out a second at warp speed, a recipe for failure.
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
author: Bill Cosby
